item.title: New post

item.title: Formação Ableton Live
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial, commands that you enter will start with the “$” prompt. The output will follow. Lines that start with “#” are comments that I’ve added to explain a point. When I show updates to a file, the “:wq” on the last line means to save the file. Here’s an example: ## this is a comment $ echo this is a command this is a command ## edit the file $vi foo.
